remarks: Division into a reciprocal.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
div1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divne0d.3 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) $.
divne0d.4 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
recdiv2d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( 1 / A ) / B ) = ( 1 / ( A x. B ) ) ) $.
